parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the marker alpha. See [[setMarkerAlpha]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''markerAlpha''' markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>AlphaMarker = markerAlpha "myMarker;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerAlpha]], [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]]
</value></part></template>
